___spark-daemon-memory.description: Memory to allocate to the spark daemon.

___host_path.description: Path in the host to be mapped into spark executors

___mem.description: Memory to allocate to each service instance.

___instances.description: Number of service instances to run in the cluster. A single instance will be run per node in the cluster. Normally, this number should be equal or higher than the number of nodes in the cluster.

___port.description: TCP port for the shuffle service

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each service instance.
